note:
Returned to the beautiful English Lake District after 40 years away, all but 10 in Shetland. I cycle for pleasure, transport & for my mental health.

I hate fascists, racists, bigots, second home owners and drivers of 4x4s / SUVs.

I love bikes, good bread, good beer, young people with a political voice, old people who can see what we've done to the world and who want to put it right.

I'm deeply concerned about the Damage we are inflicting on our planet.

#COYS by accident at a young age.

fields.name: Avatar
fields.value: Mamil (quite probably now Omil) eating a banana.

fields.name: Backdrop
fields.value: White bicycle leaning against a white fence, #Shetland seascape in the background.

fields.name: Currently Reading
fields.value: The fifth book in the Kydd series by Julian Stockwin from my library. Libraries are wonderful!

fields.name: Lives
fields.value: Cumbria, soon to be Westmoreland and Furness, North West England.
